recipe.name: Beer Muffins
recipe.notes: I'm a big sucker for all recipes Bisquick.  Truly one of the modern miracles in the kitchen, that stuff -- whatever the hell is in it.  This is the first time I've seen substantial changes to the fundamental structure of the mixture in the form of beer.
recipe.preparation: Mix very little.  Grease muffin tins.  Heat in 450F oven, then fill about 2/3 full.  Bake 15-18 minutes.  Serve with lots of butter.
